com.google.earth.search.api
Class SearchContainer

java.lang.Object
  com.google.earth.search.api.SearchContainer

public class SearchContainer
extends java.lang.Object

A SearchContainer is the object that stores a single search request issued by any supported interface and stores any number of search responses to this request.

getBoundingBoxFromRequest

public java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D getBoundingBoxFromRequest()
Parse the search request's URL parameters and return the bounding box.

Expected URL parameters (values in units of degrees): ll=,&spn=,

Latitudes will be clipped at the poles (always within -90 ... +90). Longitudes may be outside physical range (<-180 or > +180) and will not be clipped.

Returns:
the bounding box (in degrees long/lat space), or null in case of missing or invalid parameters.

expandBoundingBoxByFactorTwo

public boolean expandBoundingBoxByFactorTwo()
Expand the search request's bounding box by a factor of two.

This will replace the search request object with a new one that reflects the expanded bounding box.

Returns:
true if the bounding box was expanded successfully or false, it it already covered the entire world or could not be expanded because of invalid parameters.

expandBoundingBoxByFactor

public static java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D expandBoundingBoxByFactor(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D boundingBox,
                                                                  double factor)
Helper function to expand a bounding box by a given factor.

Latitudes will be clipped at the poles (always within -90 ... +90). Longitudes may be outside physical range (<-180 or > +180) and will not be clipped. The plugins must treat this condition appropriately to allow for searches that include the +-180 degree meridian.

Parameters:
boundingBox - the bounding box (in degrees long/lat space)
factor - the factor to expand the bounding box by, must be > 1.0
Returns:
false if it could not be expanded since it already covers the entire world
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the expanding factor is <= 1.0

buildSearchRequest

public static SearchRequest buildSearchRequest(SearchRequest oldSearchRequest,
                                               java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D boundingBox)
Helper function to build a new search request objects by copying from an existing search request but replacing the bounding box URL query parameters with a new given bounding box.

Parameters:
oldSearchRequest -
boundingBox - the new bounding box (in degrees long/lat space)
Returns:
a new search request
